recipes.title: Honey Cake
recipes.description: A delightful cake perfect for Rosh Hashanah.
instructions: Mix the ingredients.
Bake in the oven at 180°C.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Classic cookies with a rich chocolate flavor.
instructions: Cream the butter and sugar.
Add eggs and mix.
Fold in the flour and chocolate chips.
Scoop onto a baking sheet and bake at 180°C for 10 minutes.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: A hearty Italian pasta dish with a rich meat sauce.
instructions: Sauté onion, garlic, carrot, and celery in olive oil.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Pour in tomato sauce and simmer for 30 minutes.
Serve over cooked spaghetti and top with Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.description: A classic salad with crisp lettuce and creamy dressing.
instructions: Toss lettuce with croutons and Parmesan.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and serve.

recipes.title: Chicken Curry
recipes.description: A flavorful curry with tender chicken pieces.
instructions: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in curry powder and tomato.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve with rice.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A quick and healthy mix of sautéed vegetables.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok.
Add garlic and ginger, sauté briefly.
Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
Pour in soy sauce and toss to coat.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Spicy ground beef served in soft tortillas.
instructions: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning.
Warm tortillas.
Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and sour cream.

recipes.title: Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients.
Add wet ingredients and stir until smooth.
Pour batter onto a heated griddle.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip.

recipes.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.description: A classic sandwich with melted cheese.
instructions: Butter one side of each bread slice.
Place cheese between slices, buttered sides out.
Grill on medium heat until golden brown.

recipes.title: Apple Pie
recipes.description: A traditional dessert with a flaky crust.
instructions: Mix sliced apples with sugar and cinnamon.
Place in pie crust and cover with top crust.
Bake at 180°C for 45 minutes.
